articles.title: Federico Martin Aramburu dead at 42: Tributes paid to Argentina rugby hero after being killed in horror car accident
articles.description: ARGENTINA rugby star Federico Martin Aramburu has tragically died in a car accident, aged 42.His former club Stade Francais Paris released a statement
articles.content:
ARGENTINA rugby star Federico Martin Aramburu has tragically died in a car accident, aged 42.
His former club Stade Francais Paris released a statement on social media following the news he had died in the French capital.

articles.description: The 28-year-old has been named captain of the national team for the FIH Pro League tie against Argentina.
articles.content: In came the lightning-quick drag-flick, and PR Sreejesh, as always, was there to calmly paw the ball away to safety. In those six seconds, fear, turned to relief, turned to joy as India won its first Olympic medal in hockey in 41 years. The replay ha... [4911 chars]

articles.title: Former Argentina international Aramburu shot dead
articles.description: Former Argentina international Federico Aramburu was killed in Paris on Saturday morning after an altercation in a bar.
articles.content:
Former Argentina international Federico Aramburu was killed in Paris on Saturday morning after an altercation in a bar.
The incident took place around 6am local time on the boulevard Saint-Germain on the Left Bank, after a dispute between two groups.... [1195 chars]

articles.title: ‘Entre Nosotros’ Returns to No. 1 on Billboard Argentina Hot 100 Chart
articles.description: 'Entre Nosotros' dethrones Bizarrap and Residente’s "Bzrp Music Sessions, Vol. 49" from its one-week reign. Get the details.
articles.content: “Entre Nosotros” adds a 16th week at No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart as it return to lead the March 12-dated ranking. The song by Tiago PZK, LIT Killah, Nicki Nicole and Maria Becerra extends its mark for the second-longest reign since... [1338 chars]

articles.title: India To Continue Experimentation In FIH Pro League Match Against Argentina
articles.description: The Indian men's hockey team would look to test their bench strength against Argentina in the two-legged FIH Pro League tie beginning here on Saturday.
articles.content: The Indian men's hockey team would look to continue its experimentation and test its bench strength ahead of a busy calendar year, despite suffering its second defeat in the tournament, when they take on Argentina in the two-legged FIH Pro League tie... [3708 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Wheat eases as Ukraine developments weigh; soy firm on Argentina risks
articles.description: (Updates with European trading) By Gus Trompiz and Rajendra Jadhav PARIS/MUMBAI, March 18 (Reuters) - Chicago wheat futures eased on Friday as traders monitored diplomatic efforts to end Russia's invasion of Ukraine and gauged continuing disruption to Black Sea grain exports.
